code: import*as React from'react';export default function useChildListeners(){const{current:listeners}=React.useRef({action:[],focus:[]});const addListener=React.useCallback((type,listener)=>{listeners[type].push(listener);let removed=false;return()=>{const index=listeners[type].indexOf(listener);if(!removed&&index>-1){removed=true;listeners[type].splice(index,1);}};},[listeners]);return{listeners,addListener};}
